name: Best Com. Chillers, Env., PC (EE+DF) (CF)
energy_efficiency_source: Determined by custom savings shape information in 'tsv_features'

installed_cost_source.notes: Total installed cost for high efficiency chillers in 2017 divided by 12 kBtu/h cooling per ton; assumes no additional cost for load shifting capabilities

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average lifetimes for high efficiency chillers in 2017

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

market_scaling_fractions_source.title: CBECS 2012 - Table B29 - Primary space-heating energy sources, floorspace
market_scaling_fractions_source.fraction_derivation: Ventilation fraction is portion of ventilation in commercial buildings that use chiller for cooling (21,649 sf/79,294 sf).

_description: Envelope-only counterfactual for this measure, non-cold-climate
_notes: Measure Definition and Status Google spreadsheet contains calculations for combining chiller and commercial envelope measures and converting units
